description: Giving only the best care Dr. Luther believes that it
cleaned_text: Giving only the best care Dr. Luther believes that it is essential to give the body the tools it needs through the use of nutrition and proper energy medicine to heal itself. Every animal is different and it requires a skilled, experienced practitioner to determine the safest and best approach for their pet. You can feel confident that your best friend is in good hands at our hospital.
